password_too_long: The password must not exceed {{maxLength}} characters.
password_warning: Avoid patterns and sequences. Mix uppercase, lowercase, numbers and special characters.

reset_password_success: Your new password has been set.
reset_password_error: Invalid or expired token. Try recovering again.
confirm_account_error: Invalid or expired token. Try signing up again.
project_name_too_short: Project name can't be shorter than {{minLength}} characters.
project_name_too_long: Project name can't be longer than {{maxLength}} characters.
project_description_too_short: Project description can't be shorter than {{minLength}} characters.

mario_bio: Economist by trade, technologist by heart. Worked as a PwC consultant and an Investment Banker. Passionate about innovation and blockchain, in 2018 founded Blockchain Center Portugal.
helder_bio: 12 years of experience as a Backend Developer and Tech Lead (Euronext, Axway, Airtel ATN & PT Inova√ß√£o). ‚ÄúAsynchronous Android Programming‚Äù Book Author.
henrique_bio: Frontend Developer with a strong motivation to create user interfaces from the scratch to the final stage, with a focus on design systems, performance and accessibility.
maria_bio: More than 10 years of experience in the entrepreneurial world. Passionate about helping startups reach their full potential by creating winning strategies.
diogo_bio: His motto lies in meeting people, build strong relations & partnerships, find answers to the most pressing challenges. Currently fascinated about the future of work.
rubhan_bio: Enthusiastic International Business Development Strategist. Passionate about meeting new people and exploring different challenges. His dream is to fly to Mars someday.
rodrigo_bio: Rodrigo Nogueira is a Master in Statistics and Information Management with a specialization in Data-Driven Marketing with over 15 years of experience in the development of services and digital marketing.
kacper_bio: Frontend developer always up for learning something new and making things work. DIY projects enthusiast.
carlos_bio: Passionate about writing and creating content focused on providing users the best experience. Data-driven mindset, always eager to learn more. Forever in love with everything tech.
anderson_bio: Understanding and combining the business aspect with software engineering is his goal in order to build viable products. He likes art in general, mountain biking and dreams of traveling across Afrika and immerse in its ancestral culture.
ines_bio: Graphic designer/illustrator who can‚Äôt decide what she loves to do the most. Non-resting brain and hates capital letters. In love with life and using colours to make beautiful things (while listening to music). That is the essence of everything.
c3_bio: C3 Management GmbH is an asset management company focused on managing venture funds which invest in exceptional technology companies worldwide. With FinLab EOS VC Venture Fund, their mission is, among other things, to accelerate growth, development, and adoption of EOSIO-based blockchains and the EOSIO software.
pv_bio: Portugal Ventures, a venture capital firm that is part of the Banco Portugu√™s de Fomento group, currently manages 173 million euros and has more than 130 portfolio companies.
bright_bio: Bright Pixel is a company building studio. A group of experienced builders, creative thinkers and investors, whose goal is to transform two key things: the way companies address innovation and how new ventures are put together.
microsoft_bio: Microsoft for Startups is an innovative new program created to connect #startups with entrepreneurial and technology resources.
telos_bio: The Telos Foundation is an apolitical body with a mission of promoting the Telos Blockchain Network. The Foundation is a Decentralized Autonomous Organization (DAO) elected by holders of Telos Foundation Voting Tokens as defined in the Telos Blockchain Network Operating Agreement, a core Telos governance document.
eosio_bio: EOS.IO is a blockchain protocol powered by the native cryptocurrency EOS. The protocol emulates most of the attributes of a real computer including hardware with the computing resources distributed equally among EOS cryptocurrency holders.
startupjobspt_bio: Looking for a Startup Job in Portugal? The name speaks for itself.
networkme_bio: Through Networkme, students are able to explore areas, professions and companies in which they could work and make better career decisions.
blockrocket_bio: Blockrocket is an investor and accelerator for early-stage blockchain startups around the globe. They help startups, corporates, and investors to leverage the potential of blockchain technology.
haze_bio: We are an innovation and digital transformation consultancy where we unleash the innovation power of organizations, connecting and empowering people to be agents of positive transformation in their businesses.
hackathonacademy_bio: Provide technology and knowledge to empower people to transform companies and institutions through innovation challenges.
whats_and_how: What's TAIKAI and how we support hackathons? Here you can download the answers to these questions.
looking_to_download: Looking to download the TAIKAI logo? Artwork files for print (.EPS), broadcast, and web (.SVG and .PNG) can be downloaded from here.

get_high_assets: Get high-resolution assets of the TAIKAI interface on desktop, mobile and tablet.

about_us_page_description: The TAIKAI team is comprised of Finance, UI/UX Design experts, Software Engineers that built the TAIKAI platform to foster innovation and digital transformation on businesses
blog_page_desc: Blog posts and stories in TAIKAI Hackathon Platform
description: Host online, virtual hackathons and open innovation challenges. Discover the best hackathons to engage. All-in-one hackathon platform solution.
you_are_a_mentor: Thanks, you are oficially a mentor on challenge.
criteria_scale_text: On a scale of 0 to 10 (where 0 = very bad, 10 = awesome, 5 = neither good nor bad), vote on the following criteria:
are_you_sure_to_proceed_voting: Are you sure you want to proceed with this voting?
vote_action_is_irreversible: This action is irreversible and cannot be undone. After submitting these votes, you will not able to vote again so please check your votes carefully.
vote_token_action_is_irreversible: This action is irreversible and cannot be undone. After submitting your votes, you can continue to vote if your balance allows.
not_enough_balance_to_vote: Your balance does not allow to proceed with your voting proccess. Please edit your voting cart and try again.
not_enough_balance_automatic_vote: Your balance does not allow submit your amounts automatically at the end of the current step. Please edit your voting cart.
not_enough_balance_criteria_vote: Your balance does not allow to proceed with your voting proccess. You don't have balance
votes_submitted_with_success: Your votes were submitted with success.
failed_to_checkout_voting_cart: Failed to checkout your voting cart. Please try again or contact the support.
criteria_voting_explained: Your evaluations are going to be submitted based on the scores that you provided.
checkout_explained: Your evaluations will be submitted automatically at the end of the current step based on the scores you provided. This action is irreversible and cannot be undone, so please check your votes carefully.
token_automatically_checkout_explained: The amounts you provided will be submitted automatically at the end of the current step. This action is irreversible and cannot be undone, so please check your votes carefully.
all_available_balance: You are putting all your available balance into one project only.
no_going_back: Once you checkout your votes, there is no going back. Please be certain.
maintenance_desc_1: Yup, we're under a scheduled maintenance! üë®üèª‚Äçüíª

banner: We've joined forces with Bepro Labs!
are_you_sure_continue: Are you sure that you would like to continue?
user_confirm_action: By proceeding with this action, you are sure that it can not be undone.
invalid_video_url: The video URL format is invalid.
you_will_be_redirected_in_a_few_seconds: You will be redirected in a few seconds

report.report_modal_description: If you come across any behavior on our platform that goes against <1>terms and conditions</1> we encourage you to report it to us. Your feedback is invaluable in helping us maintain a safe environment for everyone.
